title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

tosdr.case: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
tosdr.tldr: The added sections to the terms of service, entitled "Dispute Resolution" and "Class Waiver" require that any disputes with Discord be resolved through binding arbitration rather than a court complaint. In addition, the terms now prohibit class action lawsuits. Both sections take effect with the new terms of service on October 23, 2018.
